GK19kmeghviu:1: aṅgenāṅgaṃ tanu ca tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ KMdV_99a
GK19kmeghviu:2: atyādityaṃ hutavahamukhe saṃbhṛtaṃ tadd hi tejaḥ KMdV_43d
GK19kmeghviu:3: adreḥ śṛṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃ svid ity unmukhībhir KMdV_14a
GK19kmeghviu:4: antarbāṣpaś ciram anucaro rājarājasya dadhyau KMdV_3b
GK19kmeghviu:6: antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ KMdV_20c
GK19kmeghviu:7: antaḥsvacchas tvam api bhavitā varṇamātreṇa kṛṣṇaḥ KMdV_49d
GK19kmeghviu:9: apy anyasmiñ jaladhara mahākālam āsādya kāle KMdV_34a
GK19kmeghviu:10: arcistuṅgān abhimukham api prāpya ratnapradīpān KMdV_69c
GK19kmeghviu:12: arhasy enaṃ śamayitum alaṃ vāridhārāsahasrair KMdV_53c
GK19kmeghviu:13: avyāpannaḥ kuśalam abale pṛcchati tvāṃ viyuktaḥ KMdV_98c
GK19kmeghviu:15: asrais tāvan muhur upacitair dṛṣṭir ālipyate me KMdV_102c
GK19kmeghviu:16: aṃsanyaste sati halabhṛto mecake vāsasīva KMdV_59d
GK19kmeghviu:19: ātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvad icchāmi kartum KMdV_102b
GK19kmeghviu:20: ādye baddhā virahadivase yā śikhā dāma hitvā KMdV_85a
GK19kmeghviu:23: āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailaṃ KMdV_9a
GK19kmeghviu:24: āmandrāṇāṃ phalam avikalaṃ lapsyase garjitānām KMdV_34d
GK19kmeghviu:27: āliṅgyante guṇavati mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ KMdV_104c
GK19kmeghviu:28: ālekhyānāṃ navajalakaṇair doṣam utpādya sadyaḥ KMdV_68b
GK19kmeghviu:29: āloke te nipatati purā sā balivyākulā vā KMdV_82a
GK19kmeghviu:31: āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ KMdV_11c
GK19kmeghviu:35: itthaṃ cetaś caṭulanayane durlabhaprārthanaṃ me KMdV_105c
GK19kmeghviu:36: itthaṃbhūtāṃ prathamavirahe tām ahaṃ tarkayāmi KMdV_90b
GK19kmeghviu:37: ity ākhyāte pavanatanayaṃ maithilīvonmukhī sā KMdV_97a
GK19kmeghviu:38: ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce KMdV_5c
GK19kmeghviu:40: iṣṭān deśān vicara jalada prāvṛṣā saṃbhṛtaśrīr KMdV_111c
GK19kmeghviu:43: utpaśyāmi drutam api sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ KMdV_22a
GK19kmeghviu:45: utsaṅge vā malinavasane somya nikṣipya vīṇāṃ KMdV_83a
GK19kmeghviu:49: ekaṃ muktāguṇam iva bhuvaḥ sthūlamadhyendranīlam KMdV_46d
GK19kmeghviu:50: ekaḥ sakhyās tava saha mayā vāmapādābhilāṣī KMdV_75c
GK19kmeghviu:51: etat kṛtvā priyam anucitaprārthanāvartmano me KMdV_111a
GK19kmeghviu:52: etasmān māṃ kuśalinam abhijñānadānād viditvā KMdV_109a
GK19kmeghviu:53: ebhiḥ sādho hṛdayanihitair lakṣaṇair lakṣaṇīyaṃ KMdV_77a
GK19kmeghviu:54: kac cit somya vyavasitam idaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me KMdV_110a
GK19kmeghviu:55: kac cid bhartuḥ smarasi nibhṛte tvaṃ hi tasya priyeti KMdV_82d
GK19kmeghviu:56: kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar dūrasaṃsthe KMdV_3d
GK19kmeghviu:57: karṇe lolaḥ kathayitum abhūd ānanasparśalobhāt KMdV_100b
GK19kmeghviu:58: kartuṃ yac ca prabhavati mahīm ucchilindhrām avandhyaṃ KMdV_12a
GK19kmeghviu:61: kasyātyantaṃ sukham upanataṃ duḥkham ekāntato vā KMdV_106c
GK19kmeghviu:62: kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ KMdV_8c
GK19kmeghviu:64: kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃ cid ūnaḥ KMdV_97d
GK19kmeghviu:66: kārśyaṃ yena tyajati vidhinā sa tvayaivopapādyaḥ KMdV_29d
GK19kmeghviu:67: kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvate te KMdV_22b
GK19kmeghviu:68: kāle kāle bhavati bhavatā yasya saṃyogam etya KMdV_9c
GK19kmeghviu:69: kiṃ cit paścād pravalaya gatiṃ bhūya evottareṇa KMdV_16d
GK19kmeghviu:73: kṛtvā tāsām abhigamam apāṃ somya sārasvatīnām KMdV_49c
GK19kmeghviu:75: ke vā na syuḥ paribhavapadaṃ niṣphalārambhayatnāḥ KMdV_54d
GK19kmeghviu:77: krīḍālolāḥ śravaṇaparuṣair garjitair bhāyayes tāḥ KMdV_61d
GK19kmeghviu:80: krīḍāśaile yadi ca viharet pādacāreṇa gaurī KMdV_60b
GK19kmeghviu:81: krūras tasminn api na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ KMdV_102d
GK19kmeghviu:82: kṣāmacchāyaṃ bhavanam adhunā madviyogena nūnaṃ KMdV_77c
GK19kmeghviu:83: kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ srotasāṃ copabhujya KMdV_13d
GK19kmeghviu:84: kṣetraṃ kṣatrapradhanapiśunaṃ kauravaṃ tad bhajethāḥ KMdV_48b
GK19kmeghviu:86: khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śikhariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra KMdV_13c
GK19kmeghviu:87: gacchantīnāṃ ramaṇavasatiṃ yoṣitāṃ tatra naktaṃ KMdV_37a
GK19kmeghviu:88: gaṇḍacchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ varhabhāreṣu keśān KMdV_101b
GK19kmeghviu:94: gatvā sadyaḥ phalam avikalaṃ kāmukatvasya labdhā KMdV_24b
GK19kmeghviu:95: gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ KMdV_7c
GK19kmeghviu:96: gambhīrāyāḥ payasi saritaś cetasīva prasanne KMdV_40a
GK19kmeghviu:98: gāḍhotkaṇṭhāguruṣu divaseṣv eṣu gacchatsu bālāṃ KMdV_80c
GK19kmeghviu:101: cakṣuḥ khedāt sajalagurubhiḥ pakṣmabhiś chādayantīṃ KMdV_89c
GK19kmeghviu:102: cūḍāpāśe navakuravakaṃ cāru karṇe śirīṣaṃ KMdV_65c
GK19kmeghviu:103: cchāyābhinnaḥ sphaṭikaviśadaṃ nirviśeḥ paravataṃ tam KMdV_62d
GK19kmeghviu:105: chāyātmāpi prakṛtisubhago lapsyate te praveśam KMdV_40b
GK19kmeghviu:110: jātāṃ manye śiśiramathitāṃ padminīṃ vānyarūpām KMdV_80d
GK19kmeghviu:111: jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ KMdV_6b
GK19kmeghviu:112: jāne sakhyās tava mayi manaḥ saṃbhṛtasneham asmād KMdV_90a
GK19kmeghviu:115: jñātāsvādaḥ pulinajaghanāṃ ko vihātuṃ samarthaḥ KMdV_41d
GK19kmeghviu:116: jyotirlekhāvalayi galitaṃ yasya barhaṃ bhavānī KMdV_44a
GK19kmeghviu:118: tac chrutvā te śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ mānasotkāḥ KMdV_12b
GK19kmeghviu:119: tat kalyāṇi tvam api sutarāṃ mā gamaḥ kātaratvam KMdV_106b
GK19kmeghviu:120: tatra vyaktaṃ dṛṣadi caraṇanyāsam ardhendumauleḥ KMdV_55a
GK19kmeghviu:124: tatsaṃdeśān manasi nihitād āgataṃ tvatsamīpam KMdV_96b
GK19kmeghviu:125: tantrīr ārdrā nayanasalilaiḥ sārayitvā kathaṃ cid KMdV_83c
GK19kmeghviu:126: tanmadhye ca sphaṭikaphalakā kāñcanī vāsayaṣṭir KMdV_76a
GK19kmeghviu:128: tasmāt tasyāḥ kumudaviśadāny arhasi tvaṃ na dhairyān KMdV_40c
GK19kmeghviu:130: tasmin kāle jalada dayitā labdhanidrā yadi syād KMdV_94a
GK19kmeghviu:131: tasmin kāle nayanasalilaṃ yoṣitāṃ khaṇḍitānāṃ KMdV_39a
GK19kmeghviu:132: tasminn adrau kati cid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī KMdV_2a
GK19kmeghviu:133: tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ ketakādhānahetor KMdV_3a
GK19kmeghviu:134: tasyā eva prabhavam acalaṃ prāpya gauraṃ tuṣāraiḥ KMdV_52b
GK19kmeghviu:136: tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir KMdV_20a
GK19kmeghviu:137: tasyāḥ kiṃ cit karadhṛtam iva prāptavānīraśākhaṃ KMdV_41a
GK19kmeghviu:138: tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyomni pūrvārdhalambī KMdV_51a
GK19kmeghviu:139: tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthum api tanuṃ dūrabhāvāt pravāham KMdV_46b
GK19kmeghviu:141: taṃ ced vāyau sarati saralaskandhasaṃghaṭṭajanmā KMdV_53a
GK19kmeghviu:143: tābhyo mokṣas tava yadi sakhe gharmalabdhasya na syāt KMdV_61c
GK19kmeghviu:144: tām āyuṣmān mama ca vacanād ātmanā copakartuṃ KMdV_98a
GK19kmeghviu:148: tām evoṣṇair virahaśayaneṣv asrubhir yāpayantīm KMdV_88d
GK19kmeghviu:149: tālaiḥ śiñjadvalayasubhagair nartitaḥ kāntayā me KMdV_76c
GK19kmeghviu:150: tāṃ kasyāṃ cid bhavanavalabhau suptapārāvatāyāṃ KMdV_38a
GK19kmeghviu:152: tāṃ jānīyāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ KMdV_80a
GK19kmeghviu:153: tīropāntastanitasubhagaṃ pāsyasi svādu yat tat KMdV_24c
GK19kmeghviu:154: tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhur gato 'haṃ KMdV_6c
GK19kmeghviu:159: toyotsargastanitamukharo mā sma bhūr viklavās tāḥ KMdV_37d
GK19kmeghviu:160: tvatsamparkāt pulakitam iva prauḍhapuṣpaiḥ kadambaiḥ KMdV_25b
GK19kmeghviu:164: tvayy ādātuṃ jalam avanate śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure KMdV_46a
GK19kmeghviu:165: tvayy āyattaṃ kṛṣiphalam iti bhrūvilāsānabhijñaiḥ KMdV_16a
GK19kmeghviu:166: tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe KMdV_18b
GK19kmeghviu:167: tvayy āsanne nayanam uparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā KMdV_92c
GK19kmeghviu:169: tvaṃ ced acchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayes tiryag ambhaḥ KMdV_51b
GK19kmeghviu:170: tvām apy asraṃ navajalamayaṃ mocayiṣyaty avaśyaṃ KMdV_91c
GK19kmeghviu:172: tvām ālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiḥ śilāyām KMdV_102a
GK19kmeghviu:175: tvām utkaṇṭhocchvasitahṛdayā vīkṣya saṃbhāvya caiva KMdV_97b
GK19kmeghviu:176: dagdhāraṇyeṣv adhikasurabhiṃ gandham āghrāya corvyāḥ KMdV_21c
GK19kmeghviu:177: darpotsekād upari śarabhā laṅghayiṣyanty alaṅghyam KMdV_54b
GK19kmeghviu:179: dīrghīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ KMdV_31a
GK19kmeghviu:180: dūrāl lakṣyaṃ tad amaradhanuś cāruṇā toraṇena KMdV_72b
GK19kmeghviu:181: dūrībhūte mayi sahacare cakravākīm ivaikām KMdV_80b
GK19kmeghviu:182: dṛṣṭaḥ svapne kitava ramayan kām api tvaṃ mayeti KMdV_108d
GK19kmeghviu:183: dṛṣṭe sūrye punar api bhavān vāhayed adhvaśeṣaṃ KMdV_38c
GK19kmeghviu:185: dvāropānte likhitavapuṣau śaṅkhapadmau ca dṛṣṭvā KMdV_77b
GK19kmeghviu:186: dhārāpātais tvam iva kamalāny abhyavarṣan mukhāni KMdV_48d
GK19kmeghviu:191: dhautāpāṅgaṃ haraśaśirucā pāvakes taṃ mayūraṃ KMdV_44c
GK19kmeghviu:193: na tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na punar alakāṃ jñāsyase kāmacārin KMdV_63b
GK19kmeghviu:194: na dhyāsyanti vyapagataśucas tvām api prekṣya haṃsāḥ KMdV_73d
GK19kmeghviu:195: nanv ātmānaṃ bahu vigaṇayann ātmanā nāvalambe KMdV_106a
GK19kmeghviu:196: na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ KMdV_8d
GK19kmeghviu:197: nidrāṃ gatvā kim api rudatī sasvanaṃ viprabuddhā KMdV_108b
GK19kmeghviu:198: nirvindhyāyāḥ pathi bhava rasābhyantaraḥ saṃnipatya KMdV_28c
GK19kmeghviu:200: nirhrādī te muraja iva cet kandarāsu dhvaniḥ syāt KMdV_56c
GK19kmeghviu:201: niḥśabdo 'pi pradiśasi jalaṃ yācitaś cātakebhyaḥ KMdV_110c
GK19kmeghviu:204: nīcairākhyaṃ girim adhivases tatra viśrāmahetos KMdV_25a
GK19kmeghviu:205: nīcair gacchaty upari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa KMdV_106d
GK19kmeghviu:206: nīcair vāsyaty upajigamiṣor devapūrvaṃ giriṃ te KMdV_42c
GK19kmeghviu:208: nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇa iva mayā sārdham icchāratair yā KMdV_88c
GK19kmeghviu:213: nīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā haritakapiśaṃ kesarair ardharūḍhair KMdV_21a
GK19kmeghviu:218: netrā nītāḥ satatagatinā yad vimānāgrabhūmīr KMdV_68a
GK19kmeghviu:220: naiśo mārgaḥ savitur udaye sūcyate kāminīnām KMdV_70d
GK19kmeghviu:223: paścād āvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tam ātmābhilāṣaṃ KMdV_107c
GK19kmeghviu:225: paśyantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ KMdV_103c
GK19kmeghviu:231: puṇyaṃ yāyās tribhuvanaguror dhāma caṇḍeśvarasya KMdV_33b
GK19kmeghviu:234: pūrvaprītyā gatam abhimukhaṃ saṃnivṛttaṃ tathaiva KMdV_89b
GK19kmeghviu:235: pūrvaspṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhaved aṅgam ebhis taveti KMdV_104d
GK19kmeghviu:236: pūrvāśāsyaṃ sulabhavipadāṃ prāṇinām etad eva KMdV_98d
GK19kmeghviu:237: pūrvoddiṣṭām anusara purīṃ śrīviśālāṃ viśālām KMdV_30b
GK19kmeghviu:238: pṛcchantī vā madhuravacanāṃ śārikāṃ pañjarasthāṃ KMdV_82c
GK19kmeghviu:239: pratyakṣaṃ te nikhilam acirād bhrātar uktaṃ mayā yat KMdV_90d
GK19kmeghviu:240: pratyākhyātuṃ na khalu bhavato dhīratāṃ tarkayāmi KMdV_110b
GK19kmeghviu:241: pratyādeśād api ca madhuno vismṛtabhrūvilāsam KMdV_92b
GK19kmeghviu:242: pratyāvṛttas tvayi kararudhi syād analpābhyasūyaḥ KMdV_39d
GK19kmeghviu:243: pratyāśvastāṃ samam abhinavair jālakair mālatīnām KMdV_95b
GK19kmeghviu:246: pratyuktaṃ hi praṇayiṣu satām īpsitārthakriyaiva KMdV_110d
GK19kmeghviu:247: pratyudyātaḥ katham api bhavān gantum āśu vyavasyet KMdV_22d
GK19kmeghviu:249: prasthānaṃ te katham api sakhe lambamānasya bhāvi KMdV_41c
GK19kmeghviu:250: prācīmūle tanum iva kalāmātraśeṣāṃ himāṃśoḥ KMdV_87b
GK19kmeghviu:251: prāpte mitre bhavati vimukhaḥ kiṃ punar yas tathoccaiḥ KMdV_17d
GK19kmeghviu:253: prāyaś cāpaṃ na vahati bhayān manmathaḥ ṣaṭpadajyam KMdV_71b
GK19kmeghviu:254: prāyaḥ sarvo bhavati karuṇāvṛttir ārdrāntarātmā KMdV_91d
GK19kmeghviu:256: prāleyādrer upataṭam atikramya tāṃs tān viśeṣān KMdV_57a
GK19kmeghviu:257: prāleyāsraṃ kamalavadanāt so 'pi hartuṃ nalinyāḥ KMdV_39c
GK19kmeghviu:258: prāsādās tvāṃ tulayitum alaṃ yatra tais tair viśeṣaiḥ KMdV_64d
GK19kmeghviu:261: prekṣiṣyante gaganagatayo dūram āvarjya dṛṣṭīr KMdV_46c
GK19kmeghviu:263: prekṣyopāntasphuritataḍitaṃ tvāṃ tam eva smarāmi KMdV_74d
GK19kmeghviu:265: bandhuprītyā samaravimukho lāṅgalī yāḥ siṣeve KMdV_49b
GK19kmeghviu:270: brūyād evaṃ tava sahacaro rāmagiryāśramasthaḥ KMdV_98b
GK19kmeghviu:271: bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya KMdV_19d
GK19kmeghviu:273: bhartur mitraṃ priyam avidhave viddhi mām ambuvāhaṃ KMdV_96a
GK19kmeghviu:274: bhartuḥ kaṇṭhacchavir iti gaṇaiḥ sādaraṃ dṛśyamāṇaḥ KMdV_33a
GK19kmeghviu:276: bhūyaś cāha tvam api śayane kaṇṭhalagnā purā me KMdV_108a
GK19kmeghviu:277: bhūyo bhūyaḥ svayam api kṛtāṃ mūrcchanāṃ vismarantī KMdV_83d
GK19kmeghviu:278: matvā devaṃ dhanapatisakhaṃ yatra sākṣād vasantaṃ KMdV_71a
GK19kmeghviu:279: matsaṃdeśaiḥ sukhayitum ataḥ paśya sādhvīṃ niśīthe KMdV_86c
GK19kmeghviu:280: matsaṃyogaḥ katham upanamet svapnajo 'pīti nidrām KMdV_87c
GK19kmeghviu:281: matsādṛśyaṃ virahatanu vā bhāvagamyaṃ likhantī KMdV_82b
GK19kmeghviu:282: madgehinyāḥ priya iti sakhe cetasā kātareṇa KMdV_74c
GK19kmeghviu:285: madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ KMdV_18d
GK19kmeghviu:286: mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ KMdV_10a
GK19kmeghviu:287: mandāyante na khalu suhṛdām abhyupetārthakṛtyāḥ KMdV_38d
GK19kmeghviu:289: mā kaulīnād asitanayane mayy aviśvāsinī bhūḥ KMdV_109b
GK19kmeghviu:290: mā bhūd asyāḥ praṇayini mayi svapnalabdhe kathaṃ cit KMdV_94c
GK19kmeghviu:291: mā bhūd evaṃ kṣaṇam api ca te vidyutā viprayogaḥ KMdV_111d
GK19kmeghviu:293: mārgaṃ tāvac chṛṇu kathayatas tvatprayāṇānukūlaṃ KMdV_13a
GK19kmeghviu:294: māsān anyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā KMdV_107b
GK19kmeghviu:301: meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'py anyathāvṛtti cetaḥ KMdV_3c
GK19kmeghviu:305: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānim aṅgānukūlaḥ KMdV_31c
GK19kmeghviu:306: yasmin dṛṣṭe karaṇavigamād ūrdhvam uddhūtapāpāḥ KMdV_55c
GK19kmeghviu:307: yasyās tīre nicitaśikharaḥ peśalair indranīlaiḥ KMdV_74a
GK19kmeghviu:308: yasyās toye kṛtavasatayo mānasaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ KMdV_73c
GK19kmeghviu:309: yasyāṃ yakṣāḥ sitamaṇimayāny etya harmyasthalāni KMdV_66a
GK19kmeghviu:310: yasyopānte kṛtakatanayaḥ kāntayā vardhito me KMdV_72c
GK19kmeghviu:312: yācñā vandhyā varam adhiguṇe nādhame labdhakāmā KMdV_6d
GK19kmeghviu:313: yā tatra syād yuvativiṣaye sṛṣṭir ādyeva dhātuḥ KMdV_79d
GK19kmeghviu:314: yām adhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛd vaḥ KMdV_76d
GK19kmeghviu:315: yā vaḥ kāle vahati salilodgāram uccairvimānā KMdV_63c
GK19kmeghviu:318: ye tvāṃ muktadhvanim asahanāḥ kāyabhaṅgāya tasmin KMdV_54a
GK19kmeghviu:319: yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te KMdV_15c
GK19kmeghviu:320: yo vṛndāni tvarayati pathi śrāmyatāṃ proṣitānāṃ KMdV_96c
GK19kmeghviu:321: raktāśokaś calakisalayaḥ kesaraś cātra kāntaḥ KMdV_75a
GK19kmeghviu:324: ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam etat purastād KMdV_15a
GK19kmeghviu:327: riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya KMdV_20d
GK19kmeghviu:330: revāṃ drakṣyasy upalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ KMdV_19c
GK19kmeghviu:331: labdhāyās te katham api sati svapnasaṃdarśaneṣu KMdV_103b
GK19kmeghviu:333: lolāpāṅgair yadi na ramase locanair vañcito 'si KMdV_27d
GK19kmeghviu:335: vakraḥ panthā yad api bhavataḥ prasthitasyottarāśāṃ KMdV_27a
GK19kmeghviu:337: vakṣyasy adhvaśramavinayane tasya śṛṅge niṣaṇṇaḥ KMdV_52c
GK19kmeghviu:338: vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu KMdV_9b
GK19kmeghviu:341: vācālaṃ māṃ na khalu subhagaṃmanyabhāvaḥ karoti KMdV_90c
GK19kmeghviu:343: vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas toyagṛdhnuḥ KMdV_10b
GK19kmeghviu:344: vāmo vāsyāḥ kararuhapadair mucyamāno madīyair KMdV_93a
GK19kmeghviu:345: vāsaḥ kāmād anibhṛtakareṣv ākṣipatsu priyeṣu KMdV_69b
GK19kmeghviu:350: viśrāntaḥ san vraja vananadītīrajātāni siñcann KMdV_26a
GK19kmeghviu:353: veśyās tvatto nakhapadasukhān prāpya varṣāgrabindūn KMdV_35c
GK19kmeghviu:356: śaṅkāspṛṣṭā iva jalamucas tvādṛśā yatra jālair KMdV_68c
GK19kmeghviu:357: śaṅke rātrau gurutaraśucaṃ nirvinodāṃ sakhīṃ te KMdV_86b
GK19kmeghviu:358: śabdākhyeyaṃ yad api kila te yaḥ sakhīnāṃ purastāt KMdV_100a
GK19kmeghviu:359: śabdāyante madhuram anilaiḥ kīcakāḥ pūryamāṇāḥ KMdV_56a
GK19kmeghviu:361: śayyotsaṅge nihitam asakṛd duḥkhaduḥkhena gātram KMdV_91b
GK19kmeghviu:362: śaśvat siddhair upahṛtabaliṃ bhaktinamraḥ parīyāḥ KMdV_55b
GK19kmeghviu:363: śāntiṃ neyaṃ praṇayibhir ato vartma bhānos tyajāśu KMdV_39b
GK19kmeghviu:366: śāpānto me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau KMdV_107a
GK19kmeghviu:371: śṛṅgocchrāyaiḥ kumudaviśadair yo vitatya sthitaḥ khaṃ KMdV_58c
GK19kmeghviu:373: śeṣaiḥ puṇyair hṛtam iva divaḥ kāntimat khaṇḍam ekam KMdV_30d
GK19kmeghviu:378: śroṣyaty asmāt param avahitā somya sīmantinīnāṃ KMdV_97c
GK19kmeghviu:383: sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai KMdV_4c
GK19kmeghviu:385: sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi KMdV_24d
GK19kmeghviu:386: sarvāvasthāsv ahar api kathaṃ mandamandātapaṃ syāt KMdV_105b
GK19kmeghviu:387: savyāpārām ahani na tathā khedayed viprayogaḥ KMdV_86a
GK19kmeghviu:388: saṃkalpais te viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ KMdV_99d
GK19kmeghviu:389: saṃkṣipyeran kṣaṇa iva kathaṃ dīrghayāmās triyāmāḥ KMdV_105a
GK19kmeghviu:391: saṃgītārtho nanu paśupates tatra bhāvī samastaḥ KMdV_56d
GK19kmeghviu:392: saṃtaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ KMdV_7a
GK19kmeghviu:393: saṃdeśaṃ me tadanu jalada śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam KMdV_13b
GK19kmeghviu:395: saṃdeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ KMdV_5b
GK19kmeghviu:397: saṃpatsyante nabhasi bhavato rājahaṃsāḥ sahāyāḥ KMdV_12d
GK19kmeghviu:401: saṃsarpantyā sapadi bhavataḥ srotasi cchāyayā sā KMdV_51c
GK19kmeghviu:403: sāntarhāsaṃ kathitam asakṛt pṛcchataś ca tvayā me KMdV_108c
GK19kmeghviu:404: sābhre 'hnīva sthalakamalinīṃ na prabuddhāṃ na suptām KMdV_89d
GK19kmeghviu:405: sāraṅgās te jalalavamucaḥ sūcayiṣyanti mārgam KMdV_21d
GK19kmeghviu:406: sā saṃnyastābharaṇam abalā pelavaṃ dhārayantī KMdV_91a
GK19kmeghviu:411: sīmante ca tvadupagamajaṃ yatra nīpaṃ vadhūnām KMdV_65d
GK19kmeghviu:412: sūryāpāye na khalu kamalaṃ puṣyati svām abhikhyām KMdV_77d
GK19kmeghviu:413: seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ KMdV_10d
GK19kmeghviu:417: saudhotsaṅgapraṇayavimukho mā sma bhūr ujjayinyāḥ KMdV_27b
GK19kmeghviu:418: saubhāgyaṃ te subhaga virahāvasthayā vyañjayantīṃ KMdV_29c
GK19kmeghviu:419: sauhārdād vā vidhura iti vā mayy anukrośabuddhyā KMdV_111b
GK19kmeghviu:420: strīṇām ādyaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ vibhramo hi priyeṣu KMdV_28d
GK19kmeghviu:421: sthātavyaṃ te nayanaviṣayaṃ yāvad abhyeti bhānuḥ KMdV_34b
GK19kmeghviu:422: sthānād asmāt sarasaniculād utpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ KMdV_14c
GK19kmeghviu:425: snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam KMdV_9d
GK19kmeghviu:426: snehān āhuḥ kim api virahahrāsinas te hy abhogād KMdV_109c
GK19kmeghviu:429: srotomūrtyā bhuvi pariṇatāṃ rantidevasya kīrtim KMdV_45d
GK19kmeghviu:431: svalpībhūte sucaritaphale svargiṇāṃ gāṃ gatānāṃ KMdV_30c
GK19kmeghviu:432: hantaikasthaṃ kva cid api na te bhīru sādṛśyam asti KMdV_101d
GK19kmeghviu:438: hitvā nīlaṃ bhujagavalayaṃ śambhunā dattahastā KMdV_60a
